This sanitized build environment ignores unrequested dependencies, which makes sure that things you didn’t specify in your Brewfile won’t get picked up by commands like bundle install, npm install, etc. It will also add compiler flags which will help find keg-only dependencies like openssl, icu4c, etc.

This script installs Homebrew to /usr/local so that you don’t need sudo when you brew install. It is a careful script; it can be run even if you have stuff installed to /usr/local already. It tells you exactly what it will do before it does it too. You have to confirm everything it will do before it starts.
trans-unit.target: 此脚本将Homebrew安装到 /usr/local ,以便在 brew install 时不需要sudo。这是一个仔细的脚本；即使已经在 /usr/local 中安装了东西，它也可以运行。它会告诉您确切的操作，然后再执行。您必须先确认它将执行的所有操作。

trans-unit.source: This sets the HOMEBREW_NO_EMOJI environment variable, causing Homebrew to hide all emoji.
trans-unit.target: 这将设置 HOMEBREW_NO_EMOJI 环境变量，从而导致Homebrew隐藏所有表情符号。

trans-unit.source: This will install all of your Node modules dependencies to your local build path. You can now continue with your build steps and take care of the installation into the Homebrew prefix on your own, following the general Homebrew formula instructions.
trans-unit.target: 这会将所有节点模块依赖项安装到本地构建路径。现在，您可以按照常规Homebrew公式说明继续构建步骤，并自行完成安装到Homebrew prefix 中的工作。

trans-unit.source: This will install your Node module in npm’s global module style with a custom prefix to libexec. All your modules’ executables will be automatically resolved by npm into libexec/bin for you, which is not symlinked into Homebrew’s prefix. We need to make sure these are installed. To do this we need to symlink all executables to bin with:
trans-unit.target: 这将以npm的全局模块样式安装您的Node模块，并带有 libexec 的自定义前缀。npm会为您自动将所有模块的可执行文件解析为 libexec/bin ，该符号不会链接到Homebrew的前缀中。我们需要确保已安装它们。为此，我们需要将所有可执行文件符号链接到 bin ：

trans-unit.source: This will prepend that folder to your PATH, ensuring any build script that searches the PATH will find it first.
trans-unit.target: 这会将该文件夹放在您的 PATH 之前，确保搜索 PATH 的所有构建脚本都将首先找到它。

trans-unit.source: Tons of build scripts break if their dependencies aren’t in either /usr or /usr/local. We fix this for Homebrew formulae (although we don’t always test for it), but you’ll find that many RubyGems and Python setup scripts break which is something outside our control.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们的依赖项不在 /usr 或 /usr/local 中,则大量构建脚本会中断。我们为Homebrew公式修复了此问题（尽管我们并不总是对其进行测试），但是您会发现许多RubyGems和Python安装脚本都中断了，这是我们无法控制的。

trans-unit.source: Upstream should have a release branch for each formula version, and release security updates for each version when necessary. For example, PHP 7.0 was not a supported version but PHP 7.2 was in January 2020. By contrast, most software projects are structured to only release security updates for their latest versions, so their earlier versions are not eligible for versioning.

Upstream should have a release branch for the versioned formulae version and still make security updates for that version, when necessary. For example, PHP 5.5 was not a supported version but PHP 7.2 was in January 2018.
trans-unit.target: 上游应具有版本化公式版本的发行分支，并在必要时仍对该版本进行安全更新。例如，不支持PHP 5.5，但PHP 7.2于2018年1月发布。

Use :any_of, :all_of or :with to describe complex license expressions. :any_of should be used when the user can choose which license to use. :all_of should be used when the user must use all licenses. :with should be used to specify a valid SPDX exception. Add + to an identifier to indicate that the formulae can be licensed under later versions of the same license.

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should differ in major/minor (not patch) versions from the current stable release. This is because patch versions indicate bug or security updates, and we want to ensure you apply security updates.
Versioned formulae should not have resources that require security updates. For example, a node@6 formula should not have an npm resource but instead rely on the npm provided by the upstream tarball.
trans-unit.target: 版本化公式不应包含需要安全更新的 resource 。例如， node@6 公式不应具有 npm 资源，而应依赖于上游tarball提供的 npm 。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should only be linkable at the same time as their non-versioned counterpart if the upstream project provides support for it, e.g. using suffixed binaries. If this is not possible, use keg_only :versioned_formula to allow users to have multiple versions installed at once.
trans-unit.target: 如果上游项目提供了支持，例如，使用带后缀的二进制文件，则版本化公式只能与非版本化公式同时链接。如果这不可能，请使用 keg_only :versioned_formula 允许用户一次安装多个版本。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae should share a codebase with the main formula. If the project is split into a different repository, we recommend creating a new formula (formula2 rather than formula@2 or formula@1).

Versioned formulae submitted should be expected to be used by a large number of people. If this ceases to be the case, they will be removed. We will aim not to remove those in the top 3,000 install_on_request formulae.

Versioned formulae submitted should be expected to be used by a large number of people. If this ceases to be the case: they will be removed. We will aim not to remove those in the top 3,000 install_on_request formulae.
trans-unit.target: 应该期望提交的版本化公式可以被大量人使用。如果情况不再如此：它们将被删除。我们的目标是不要删除前3,000个 install_on_request 公式中的那些。

trans-unit.source: Versioned formulae we include in homebrew/core must meet the following standards:
trans-unit.target: 我们在自制软件/内核中包含的版本化公式必须满足以下标准：

trans-unit.source: Versioned software should build on all Homebrew’s supported versions of macOS.
trans-unit.target: 版本软件应基于Homebrew支持的所有macOS版本构建。

trans-unit.source: Virtualenv has a --system-site-packages switch to allow “global” (i.e. Homebrew’s) site-packages to be accessible from within the virtualenv.
trans-unit.target: Virtualenv具有 --system-site-packages 开关，以允许从virtualenv内部访问“全局”（即Homebrew） site-packages 。

trans-unit.source: We aim to bottle everything.
trans-unit.target: 我们的目标是把一切都装进瓶子里。

trans-unit.source: We appreciate your help in keeping Homebrew’s formulae up to date as new versions of software are released!

We are not willing to remove software packaged in Homebrew/homebrew-core in favour of an upstream tap. We are not willing to instruct users in our formulae to use your formulae instead. If upstream projects have issues with how Homebrew packages your software: please file issues (or, ideally, pull requests) to address these problems.
We do not defer to extensive nonstandard capitalisation, typesetting, or other styling of brand names, aside from the normal capitalisation of proper nouns and simple internal capitalisation
trans-unit.target: 除了专有名词的正常大写和简单的内部大写外,我们不会对品牌名称进行大量的非标准大写、排版或其他样式的处理。

trans-unit.source: We don’t accept software without a tagged version because they regularly break due to upstream changes and we can’t provide bottles for them.
trans-unit.target: 我们不接受没有标签版本的软件，因为它们会由于上游更改而定期中断，因此我们无法为其提供包装。

trans-unit.source: We don’t like binary formulae
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢二进制公式

trans-unit.source: We don’t like install scripts that are pulling from the master branch of Git repositories or unversioned, unchecksummed tarballs. These should use resource blocks with specific revisions or checksummed tarballs instead. Note that we now allow tools like cargo, gem and pip to download specifically versioned libraries during installation.
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢从Git存储库的 master 分支中提取的安装脚本或未版本化，未经校验的tarball。这些应该使用具有特定修订版的 resource 块或校验和的tarball。请注意，我们现在允许在安装过程中使用 cargo ， gem 和 pip 之类的工具来下载特定版本的库。

trans-unit.source: We don’t like install scripts that download unversioned things
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢下载未版本化内容的安装脚本

trans-unit.source: We don’t like tools that upgrade themselves
trans-unit.target: 我们不喜欢自行升级的工具

trans-unit.source: We frown on authors submitting their own work unless it is very popular.
trans-unit.target: 我们不赞成作者提交自己的作品,除非它非常受欢迎。

trans-unit.source: We generally try not to duplicate system libraries and complicated tools in core Homebrew but we do duplicate some commonly used tools.
trans-unit.target: 一般来说,我们在核心Homebrew中尽量不重复系统库和复杂的工具,但我们确实重复了一些常用的工具。

trans-unit.source: We may temporarily add versioned formulae for our own needs that do not meet these standards in homebrew/core. The presence of a versioned formula there does not imply it will be maintained indefinitely or that we are willing to accept any more versions that do not meet the requirements above.
trans-unit.target: 我们可能会为满足自己的需要临时添加版本化公式，这些公式不符合Homebrew / core中的这些标准。此处存在版本化公式并不意味着将无限期维护该公式，或者我们愿意接受任何其他不满足上述要求的版本。

trans-unit.source: We now accept stuff that comes with macOS as long as it uses keg_only :provided_by_macos to be keg-only by default.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们接受macOS随附的东西，只要它使用 keg_only :provided_by_macos 默认为仅桶装即可。

trans-unit.source: We now accept versioned formulae as long as they meet the requirements.
trans-unit.target: 现在，只要符合要求，我们就可以接受版本化公式。

trans-unit.source: We only accept formulae that use a Debian Free Software Guidelines license or are released into the public domain following DFSG Guidelines on Public Domain software.
We prefer:
trans-unit.target: 我们倾向于:

trans-unit.source: We removed SHA1 support in November 2016, 21 months after we started warning people to move away from it for verification. This is enforced in the same way MD5 is, by blocking the installation of that individual formula until the checksum is migrated.
trans-unit.target: 在我们开始警告人们不要使用SHA1进行验证之后的21个月，我们于2016年11月取消了SHA1支持。通过阻止安装单个公式，直到迁移校验和，都以与MD5相同的方式实施。

trans-unit.source: We respect all people’s choice of personal pronouns
trans-unit.target: 我们尊重所有人对人称代词的选择

trans-unit.source: We set up distutils such that pip install will always put modules in $(brew --prefix)/lib/pythonX.Y/site-packages and scripts in $(brew --prefix)/share/python. Therefore, you won’t need sudo!
trans-unit.target: 我们将distutils设置为 pip install 始终将模块放在 $(brew --prefix)/lib/pythonX.Y/site-packages 中,并将脚本放在 $(brew --prefix)/share/python 中。因此，您不需要sudo！

trans-unit.source: We strive for “correct” but not “fancy” usage. Think newspaper article, not academic paper.
trans-unit.target: 我们力求“正确”使用，而不是“花哨”使用。想想报纸上的文章，而不是学术论文。

trans-unit.source: We use the macOS sandbox to stop this but this doesn’t work when run as the root user (which also has read and write access to almost everything on the system).
trans-unit.target: 我们使用macOS沙箱来阻止此操作，但是以 root 用户身份运行时，此操作将无效（root用户也具有对系统上几乎所有内容的读写访问权限）。

trans-unit.source: We want tests that don’t require any user input and test the basic functionality of the application. For example foo build-foo input.foo is a good test and (despite their widespread use) foo --version and foo --help are bad tests. However, a bad test is better than no test at all.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望不需要任何用户输入的测试，并测试应用程序的基本功能。例如， foo build-foo input.foo 是一个很好的测试，并且（尽管广泛使用） foo --version 和 foo --help 是不好的测试。但是，糟糕的测试总比没有好。

trans-unit.source: We will reject formulae that seem too obscure, partly because they won’t get maintained and partly because we have to draw the line somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 我们将拒绝看起来过于晦涩的公式，部分是因为它们无法得到维护，部分是因为我们不得不在某些地方划清界限。

trans-unit.source: We’re a package manager so we want to do things like resolve dependencies and set up applications for our users. If things require too much manual intervention then they aren’t useful in a package manager.
trans-unit.target: 我们是一个程序包管理器，因此我们想做一些事情，例如解决依赖关系并为我们的用户设置应用程序。如果事情需要太多的手动干预，那么它们在包管理器中就没有用了。

trans-unit.source: Well done, you are now a Homebrew contributor!
trans-unit.target: 做得很好,你现在是家酿贡献者了。

trans-unit.source: What both methods have in common is that they are setting the correct environment for using npm inside Homebrew and are returning the arguments for invoking npm install for their specific use cases. This includes fixing an important edge case with the npm cache (caused by Homebrew’s redirection of HOME during the build and test process) by using our own custom npm_cache inside HOMEBREW_CACHE, which would otherwise result in very long build times and high disk space usage.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方法的共同点在于，它们为在Homebrew中使用npm设置了正确的环境，并返回了针对特定用例调用 npm install 的参数。这包括通过在 npm_cache 内使用我们自己的自定义npm_cache来 HOMEBREW_CACHE npm缓存（由Homebrew 在构建和测试过程中对 HOME 进行重定向导致的）的一个重要问题，否则将导致非常长的构建时间和高磁盘空间使用率。

trans-unit.source: When patching (i.e. fixing header file inclusion, fixing compiler warnings, etc.) the first thing to do is check whether or not the upstream project is aware of the issue. If not, file a bug report and/or submit your patch for inclusion. We may sometimes still accept your patch before it was submitted upstream but by getting the ball rolling on fixing the upstream issue you reduce the length of time we have to carry the patch around.
trans-unit.target: 当 patch 荷兰国际集团（即固定头文件包含，修复编译器警告等）做的第一件事就是检查上游项目是否是意识到这个问题。如果不是，请提交错误报告和/或提交补丁以包含在内。有时我们可能仍会在上游提交补丁之前接受您的补丁，但是通过解决上游问题，您可以缩短我们随身携带补丁的时间。

trans-unit.source: You can run brew audit --strict --online to test formulae for adherence to Homebrew house style. The audit command includes warnings for trailing whitespace, preferred URLs for certain source hosts, and a lot of other style issues. Fixing these warnings before committing will make the process a lot quicker for everyone.
trans-unit.target: 您可以运行 brew audit --strict --online 以测试公式是否符合Homebrew房屋风格。所述 audit 命令包括用于尾随空白警告，对于某些源主机优选的网址，和很多其他的风格的问题。在提交之前修复这些警告将使每个人的过程更快。

Sometimes, brew update-python-resources won’t be able to automatically update the resources. If this happens, try running brew update-python-resources --print-only <formula> to print the resource stanzas instead of applying the changes directly to the file. You can then copy and paste resources as needed.

You must configure your shell to enable its completion support. This is because the Homebrew-managed completions are stored under HOMEBREW_PREFIX which your system shell may not be aware of, and since it is difficult to automatically configure bash and zsh completions in a robust manner, the Homebrew installer does not do it for you.
trans-unit.target: 您必须配置外壳以启用其完成支持。这是因为Homebrew管理的 HOMEBREW_PREFIX 存储在系统外壳可能不知道的HOMEBREW_PREFIX下，并且由于很难以健壮的方式自动配置 bash 和 zsh 补全，因此Homebrew安装程序不会为您执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: You need to have the Xcode Command Line Utilities installed (and updated): run xcode-select --install in the terminal.
trans-unit.target: 您需要安装（并更新）Xcode命令行实用程序：在终端中运行 xcode-select --install 。

trans-unit.source: You should only ever sudo a tool you trust. Of course, you can trust Homebrew 😉 But do you trust the multi-megabyte Makefile that Homebrew runs? Developers often understand C++ far better than they understand make syntax. It’s too high a risk to sudo such stuff. It could modify (or upload) any files on your system. And indeed, we’ve seen some build scripts try to modify /usr even when the prefix was specified as something else entirely.
trans-unit.target: 您只应该使用您信任的工具。当然，您可以信任Homebrew😉但是您是否信任Homebrew运行的数兆字节的Makefile？开发人员通常对C ++的理解远胜于对make语法的理解。sudo这样的东西的风险太大。它可以修改（或上传）系统上的任何文件。确实，我们已经看到一些构建脚本试图修改 /usr ,即使将前缀完全指定为其他名称。
